content.label:
Would you rather buy an Xbox 360 for 200+ dollars and Espgaluda II for 90+ dollars, or buy Espgaluda II for $11.99? In this situation, YOU would be considered the greedy one, because you can't be bothered to fish out eight dollars from your wallet. (And you also didn't notice when the game went on sale, either, I presume.)

Anyway, Espgaluda II is addicting; I never get tired of the amazing soundtrack, graphics, and gameplay. I think I might buy the full version!
Definitely worth getting the full version.
Might buy the full version now.

Smartphone version is a lot of fun! I couldn't handle the complicated controls necessary for scoring big in Arcade mode, so I just bought the smartphone version. Maybe I'll save the arcade version for my X360 where I can play with a controller. That one is region-free, after all. 

Try and beat my score: 264 million (using Asagi)!
$11.99 is way too much for this game when you have AAA titles selling for $0.99. Cave what are you thinking?
Nine bucks? You fools are out of your minds.

This game is decent.  I downloaded this to see if it was worth the price in the OpenFeint fire sale.   It has a more japanese feel then say Warblade, StarCannon or BusterRed, but basically the same feel.  Those games are far cheaper.  It's on sale now for 5 dollars from 9.  I'd buy it if it were 1 or 2 but considering the level of games you can get for that price compared to this one, that's a No Way!  For those of you who like it only for it's Anime influence then it's probably the game for you.  I will continue to keep this free version and wait for the price to drop to 1 or 2 dollars then I will get it.  This game is definitely worth it for that price.  And they would probably get a much greater response if the price was more reasonable.

I don't know why people are complaning about price. It is the best shooter that has original arcade version and special iPhone version, and excellent soundtrack. 

I think people are comparing this game with other crappy shooter, like WWii or Phoenix or somethingelse. This genre is called Hell Shooting. Not just shooting, but hell shooting. It's all about bullets everywhere on screen and dodge them all while using over powered weapon to kill enemies. 

If you think this game is over priced, then you are either cheap or just not into the hell shooting game. People now think every game needs to be $0.99, thanks to the tiny wing and angry bird. Well, Espgalude is console game, not a app. You can save $50 by purchasing this game, rather than buying xbox360 version (which still worth it) and paying tons of money on arcade machine. 

Cave co., don't listen to idiotic people who know nothing. (like whining about having 2nd Gen and says not working and rates one star on app. It's not because of updates and thing but old device DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH POWER to run so many bullets on screen. It's like trying to play call of duty modern warfare on 90's PC) 

this game worth $9. Keep it that way.

Fun demo. No shock to anyone that an arcade shooter is not going warrent $9 except from the games fanboys. $3.99 max. I'll wait for the sale as well. LowerthepricecaveLowerthepricecaveLowerthepricecaveLowerthepricecave!!!!!
This game is extremely fun! I love it, but I am not, or will I ever, pay 9 dollars for a game that is on an iPod. This game seriously needs a big sale, or I'm never buying!!!!!!

Please read this full thing: 9 dollars for a iPod app? Seriously? Cmon. This is a music player with special capabilities. This is not a fancy console system where game prices drive the industry. I understand .99. Even 4.99 if the game is awesome. But nearly 10 dollars for a game that you only play when you're between meetings or trying to pass time during class? Thats disgusting  This is a beautiful game. But you'll get thousands of dollars more if the price is accessible to all. Not just the rich kids whose parents cover their iTunes accounts.
Olay

title.label: Super fun. But overpriced. Hello we are in a recession!

content.label:
Love cave games. But please not worth $3 tops.

Offer a $0.99 sale and I'll buy all ur games.
The graphics are grainy, the set up is weird and confusing, worst of all it crashes like right in the middle of the action. Game definitely needs some work.
I like this game . Has really good graphics and is pretty addicting but I can't tell if I won.. Is tht becuz it's a lite version

After playing this lite ver, I can't go back to playing the older shmups on the app store. They don't measure up to Espgaluda.

Please consider putting the full version on sale so more people can buy it!

There are so many great, epic SHMUPS for a buck on the iPhone, such as Phoenix, Super Laser, iFighter 1945, and Assault Squadron. Even A classic like R-Type is just $2 (even though it should be $1, considering the aforementioned games exceed its value). 

Developers are out of their minds for demanding 8X the normal going rate for a game of this scale. Why anybody would pay a whopping $8 for this game, when they have so many better, cheaper alternatives, is frightening.

title.label: Too unknown to be so expensive!

content.label: Would've bought the full version a long time ago if it weren't so overpriced. No way I'm paying $9 for an iPhone game not made by a big name developer. Great demo though.
It's ok it's not the best shooter I've ever played and it's defiantly not bullet hell but again it's just ok
Not that great, shooter arcade type game, no real point
While this game succeeds in being as boisterous and colorful as the arcade game,  its not as fun as multiplay sims like Star Pagga.
No way in he'll I'll pay $8 for this crap. I will do just fine with Siberian Strike from Gameloft. This game here is a rip off and is whack.
This game worked perfectly in iPhone 4, but the price is way too much. I can only justify up to 4 or 5 bucks on this.

To all you people that rate this 1 star because it does not work on your iPod Touch 2G or iPhone 3G:

Why it does not work for you:
This game is an extreme shoot-em-up and requires massive amounts if memory to run, which the iPhone 3G and iPod Touch 2G do not have. 

So when you people rate this one star because of this reason, it is about the same as complaining about not being able to play Half Life 2 on your old Atari 2600 (ok, I know, slight exaggeration, but you get my point).

Finally, this is a great game and deserves 5 stars.
if was 4.99 i'd buy. 9 bucks its too much, even if i loved the game. The only game worth more than 5buck is Chaos Rings from SquareEnix

Made me really want the full version, until I saw it was $8.99... I feel like for $2.99 at most this would be worth it, but nearly 10 dollars?! Come on... Bring it down and you'll have many new and happy customers!
This game looks sooooo good on iPhone4. Total John Blaze. Price needs to drop tho.
make it work on all ipod touches
Umm...  I have a new 3rd gen 8gb touch and it's auto crash on stage load.  Is it true this only works on 32 and 64gb models?  Sad if so...  Rating of 3 until I can actually pass judgment.
9 bucks?!?  I've been dying for a top down shooter I would instantly fall for...  9 bucks is a bit much, 1/2 off sale please would triple sales

OMG FINALLY a game worth playing on my iPhone... it's about time someone made a great game port for a handheld.  I'm blown away at how good the frame rate is... zero slowdown!!!!  Cave are the masters!!... please keep em coming!!!!

title.label: Great game from the gods of bullet hell!

content.label: Just so people know, the reason this doesn't run on older models is that there's too many bullets onscreen at times for them to be able to process. So there's no way a 3G or early 3rd gen touch could run it without exploding into a million pieces.
After a couple plays through the demo I wish I could get myself to fork over $9 but I jus simply can't. And why does the sound disappear after I leave the app and come back?

I can't believe I'm playing a Cave shmup on my iPhone!!

Runs perfect on my iPhone 4!! I'm totally buying this. 

Cave, please make more iPhone ports!!!!!

This game has the best gameplay experience in it's class! Very enjoyable.
However the full version costs $8.99 which makes me shrug.
For $8.99, I'd expect much more.
Isn't there something that can be done so I can play this on my 8gb iPod?
Cave makes great games this port is awful. Won't run on75% of the hardware out there. Great idea.
Looks cool but I can't get it to work at all. Litterally unplayable in its current state.
Great game but why $9.  No wonder it's under the category undiscovered.

Going... Going... Almost there! Yeah! I get to play! Finally! Yeah- huh? Crash?NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOoOOOOOOOOOO! Actually, the disclaimer says it only runs on 32 gig and 64 gig 3rd gen itouhes.
Crash please fix!
Game crashes right before stage and I don't I should need to buy I new itouch just to play ur game. And ur probobly losing alot of money on this to cave.
All the options on the main screen work. But it crashes as soon as it loads for the actual game. And I just got an itouch 3 days ago so I don't know why it would be crashing

title.label: It's amazing. If you have a 3gs.

content.label:
I am a huge fan of cave's shooters. I love them, all. I know it is for hardware reasons, but I find it very dissapointing that there is no 3g or 2ng support.

It's not impossible to optimize for 2ng, I know this because Rrootage has done it. (rrootage uses some cave shooter bullet patterns).

Therefore my rating is a 2. An amazing game, definitley buy it if you have a 3rd gen....Best bullet game for idevice.

But Cave, of youre reading this, please, seriously consider making this work for ipod 2g.

Maybe Mushihimesama Futari instead?
Epic failure it loads up to the point were the stage is about to begins then all but failure occurs

title.label: Only one level but great fun!

content.label: I'll be buying the full version ASAP!

@55
2gen don't work
I couldn't even play. iPod, and this needs to be fixed. It crashed all over the place before gameplay.
Holy cow!! I feel like I have the arcade in the palm of my hand. AWESOME game, thanks!!!!!
